info.description: This is the API documentation for the Hello Professor parking management system.
info.title: Hello Professor API

get.description: Get a list of all parking records, with pagination

parameters.description: Limit number of parking records returned
parameters.name: limit

post.description: Add a new parking record to the system. This is a general endpoint, for specific entry/exit events, use /parking-records/entry and /parking-records/exit.
Records when a vehicle enters the parking lot, accepting license plate and an optional image file.

parameters.description: Optional image of the vehicle/license plate
parameters.name: image

post.description: Records when a vehicle exits the parking lot. Checks for payment status.

get.description: Get all parking records associated with a specific License Plate
get.summary: Get parking records by License Plate

get.description: Get the most recent parking record for a specific License Plate
get.summary: Get the latest parking record by License Plate

get.description: Search all parking records by a partial or full License Plate (case-insensitive)
get.summary: Search parking records by License Plate (fuzzy search)

get.description: Get details of a parking record by its ID
get.summary: Get a parking record by ID

put.description: Update details of an existing parking record by its ID. Can be used for manual adjustments.

delete.description: Remove a parking record from the system by its ID
delete.summary: Delete a parking record by ID

post.description: Marks a parking record as paid and ideally creates a transaction record.

400.description: Invalid request (e.g., validation error, amount mismatch)

402.description: Payment required conditions not met (e.g., fee not calculated, already paid, vehicle exited)

post.description: Calculates and stores the parking fee if not already calculated for an active parking record. Returns the record with payment details.
post.summary: Prepare a parking record for payment by calculating/retrieving its fee

200.description: Successfully calculated/retrieved fee, record ready for payment

400.description: Invalid Record ID or record already exited/paid

patch.description: Allows a user to correct or verify the license plate for an existing parking record.
patch.summary: Update user-verified license plate for a parking record

get.description: Calculates the percentage of vehicle entries that have an associated image.
get.summary: Get the rate of parking entries with images

parameters.description: Start time for the report (RFC3339 format, e.g., 2023-01-01T00:00:00Z)
parameters.name: startTime

parameters.description: End time for the report (RFC3339 format, e.g., 2023-01-31T23:59:59Z)
parameters.name: endTime

get.description: Retrieves the total capacity, occupied spots, and available spots in the parking lot.
Retrieves the total revenue collected from parking fees.
get.summary: Get total revenue from parking fees within a time range

parameters.description: Start time for the report (RFC3339 format, e.g., 2023-01-01T00:00:00Z)
parameters.name: startTime

parameters.description: End time for the report (RFC3339 format, e.g., 2023-01-31T23:59:59Z)
parameters.name: endTime

get.description: Retrieves the total number of parking events (vehicle entries).
get.summary: Get total parking count within a time range

parameters.description: Start time for the report (RFC3339 format, e.g., 2023-01-01T00:00:00Z)
parameters.name: startTime

parameters.description: End time for the report (RFC3339 format, e.g., 2023-01-31T23:59:59Z)
parameters.name: endTime

get.description: Get a list of all transactions, with pagination

post.description: Add a new transaction to the system

get.description: Get all transactions associated with a specific ParkingRecord ID
Get details of a transaction by its ID

put.description: Update details of an existing transaction by its ID

delete.description: Remove a transaction from the system by its ID
